InstructionData.Title: Multi Arc Furnace Manager
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias NameRom d0 alias Display d1
alias NameIndex r15 alias NumEntries r14 alias Name r13
define ARC HASH("StructureArcFurnace")
Start: s Display Mode DisplayMode.Default s Display On 1 s NameRom On 0 move NameIndex 0 Loop: yield get NumEntries NameRom 511 beqz NumEntries Loop s NameRom On 0
get Name NameRom NameIndex
lbn r0 ARC Name Activate Maximum lbns r1 ARC Name 0 Occupied Maximum
or r0 r0 r1 sbn ARC Name On r0 sbn ARC Name Activate r0 select r0 r0 Color.Yellow Color.Gray s Display Color r0
s db Setting NameIndex add r0 NameIndex 1 s Display Setting r0
add NameIndex NameIndex 1 mod NameIndex NameIndex NumEntries j Loop
